ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Not true in my experience.  Bard songs that buff resists do still make a difference. Sylly ... From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@kpe.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Not true in my experience. Bard songs that buff resists do still make a
difference.

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 1:05 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message

Bards used to be useful in large raids for their ability to provide resists,
but given the influx of uber gear it is not difficult to obtain unbuffed
resists in the 150s in multiple areas. Add to that the soft cap on resists
and the fact that even with maxed resists many, many spells land anyway and
bards have little to no use in a raid.
